tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a root canal treatment done at the clinic .... Dr Sulabhi is so humble and caring she took care of me throughout the process ....she knows her work really well 👍👍 ...her technique is so precise and an expert one indeed ...I noticed there were patients of all age groups coming for the treatment....and all were coming back with a smile on their face including me ....its something which is generally not expected in dental clinics😊😊 ...will definitely recommend her for all your dental problems ...and senior citizens were praising her .... my search for a good dentist for my family ends with her...Thank you soooo very much Dr Sulabhi Shyam😊😊🤗🤗 ....God bless you dear 😇😇💖💖🌹🌹..keep doing the good work 👍👍

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sulabh is the most trustworthy, ******** * very very Efficient and Dedicated doctor. I have gone to her today to get my dental check- up for toothache. She explained the problem and the treatment for it in so clarified way and did my tooth- filling. She is very superb in her work. I was v v satisfied with the treatment. She is v v decent, Soft-spoken and v sweet in her every word with the patient. I highly recommend her for any dental problems .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Fillings,
review: I had a good experience getting wisdom tooth extracted, couple of root canals and a broken tooth reconstruction. Dr Sulabhi explained the procedure in detail and long-term tooth-care tips. The extraction and RCT were largely pain free. Although recovery took time and was not entirely pain free, particularly post anaesthesia effect. All in all, I am happy and would easily recommend getting tooth treatments done here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: I was recommended removal of wisdom teeth and RCT in one of the tooth. Dr Sulabhi explained the entire process of treatment in detail and clarified all the doubts I had. The entire process was completely painless and was done with utmost care. The clinic is very clean and has a very relaxing atmosphere. I am completely satisfied with the outcome and will highly recommend her.

review: Very nice Doctor. I am quite satisfied with the treatment. Dr fees and other Charges are quite reasonable.

review: She is excellent at her job .Explains you about your issues and guides you properly.Does not rush and does not leave a patient till one is completely satisfied.Strongly recommend her.
I would say the treatment and behaviour was very good and on point. The experience as a whole was very positive.
